resume.skillmessage: Here are all the skills that I'm comfortable doing.

education.description: During the bootcamp I have learned how to work with a group remote and also to work at a fast pace. I learned the essential skills to become a fullstack developer, I also learned how to cooperate with a team with people who have different ideas on how to do things different and how to resolve it.

At this technical school I got my advanced certificate in welding. Which includes that I was an advanced Stick, Mig, Tig and pipe welder. I also competed in the skills usa compatition in salt lake city in which i took 4th place.

work.title: Welder/Welders helper
work.description: I was a welder, I took messurments, cut pipe, brushed welds, got equipment ready and preped.

testimonials.text: You are one of the hardest working students that has ever walked into my class room.
I like how your the first person to work and always the last person to leave, and i like the dedication you have towards a craft you have the desire for.
testimonials.user: Brian Searle, First Employer I worked for.
